physical_examinations.vital_signs: Hemoglobin level: 137 g/L; Leukocyte count: 5.8 x 10^9 cells/L; Platelet count: 5.0 x 10^9 cells/L
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Bilateral sensorineural hearing loss confirmed; No signs of neuromuscular disease.
Petechiae observed over the body and palate.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Thrombocytopenia improved to 298.0 x 10^9 cells/L after treatment with Rh o(D) immune globulin and prednisone.
